column4: Im having problems setting up my 3d driver stuff with ubuntu have install nvidia driver software but opengl will not start? have a MX440 agp card
you may need the nvidia-old package
what sort of problems are you havingt
can you explain what you mean by opengl is not working
I am getting this message about the driver Xlib:  extension "GLX" missing on display ":0.0".
is xorg using the nvidia driver ?
do you mean your underscore ( _ ) key
that sounds like your keyboard map is wrong, does it do anything when you try to use an _
ooooh you mean the ability to minimise windows
is that what you mean you can't minimise/close windows ?
is that becuase your window theme is now controled by compiz/emerald rather than QT ?
your not giving us much to go on, have you tried changing the theme
I can change themes in compiz effects
and does that bring the minimise / close options back ?
I have no problems using hotmail
